General.Name: Mobiis Co. Ltd
General.Description: Mobiis Co., Ltd. designs and builds equipment and systems to monitor and control the particle accelerator beams and associated equipment worldwide. The company offers low-level radio frequency, solid state amp, undulator, and step motor controllers; nuclear fusion reactor control systems, such as control data access and communication framework service system, central interlock system, and coil power supply system; and intelligent control solutions. Mobiis Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
